Header.title: TARORA REJUVENATION
Header.paragraph: Realize the skin of your dreams

paragraph: Welcome to Tarora Rejuvenation, where beauty meets wellness.

Founded by Meena Bagga, a seasoned expert with over two decades of experience in the beauty and wellness industry, Tarora Rejuvenation is dedicated to enhancing the health and radiance of your skin. Meena's passion and expertise are the driving forces behind our commitment to providing top-tier services that prioritize your comfort, quality, and beauty.

At Tarora Rejuvenation, we are dedicated to offering the latest advancements in aesthetic treatments and technologies in the industry across Canada and the USA. Our skilled professionals create a welcoming and friendly atmosphere, ensuring that every visit is both effective and enjoyable. During your consultation, we prioritize patient education, taking the time to discuss treatment options and thoroughly setting realistic expectations. Together, we’ll develop a personalized treatment plan tailored to your unique aesthetic goals; incorporating state-of-the-art in-office treatments and a customized skincare regimen to help you maintain a radiant look for years to come.

Team.name: Meena
Team.bio: As the founder of Tarora Rejuvenation, Meena brings with her decades of experience around the aesthetics and medical industry as she has always been around professionals. She brings great insight and compassion in what she does, ensuring everyone is well taken care of and is delightful and satisfied with their experience.

Team.name: Tarannum
Team.bio: As the general manager of Tarora Rejuvenation Tarannum is currently in the final stages of finishing her medical degree & has been working with medical professionals for over 5 years. She continually strives forward and keeps her knowledge up to date with the cutting edge advancements in the medical-aesthetics field to ensure everything she does exceeds the current Aesesthics medical standard.

Team.name: Rahab
Team.bio: As the Premier registered nurse of Tarora Rejuvenation, Rahab brings extensive medical and Aesthetical experience to the field, With over 10 years of experience as a nurse, and over 5 years as an injector; she strives to make the beauty process as relaxing as possible while making you look astonishingly captivating.

Team.name: Nadia
Team.bio: As a skilled Nurse Injector at Tarora Rejuvenation, Nadia brings over 3 years of experience in the aesthetics industry, specializing in Botox and fillers. She is proficient in a wide range of injection techniques and provides tailored recommendations to help you achieve your desired look. Nadia ensures you are fully informed and confident in making the best choices to enhance your natural beauty.

Team.name: Muskan
Team.bio: As the Clinical Receptionist at Tarora Rejuvenation, Muskan is the welcoming face that greets every client with a warm smile and ensures a seamless experience from start to finish. With a passion for customer service and a deep understanding of the clinic's wide range of aesthetic treatments, Muskan provides exceptional support by managing appointments, answering inquiries, and guiding clients through their journey to looking and feeling their best.

Team.name: Serkalem Yimer
Team.bio: As a highly skilled Massage Therapist at Tarora, Serkalem brings over 3 years of experience in the wellness industry and is proficient in a wide range of massage techniques. She provides exceptional guidance and customized massage solutions, ensuring that you are well-informed and receive the best possible treatment to achieve ultimate relaxation and well-being.

Team.name: Anoop
Team.bio: Anoop is a certified medical esthetician at Tarora Rejuvenation who is deeply passionate about helping every client feel confident and cared for. She continuously strives to grow her knowledge and perfect her skills to deliver the best possible results. With a warm, personalized approach to treatments like facials, laser, microneedling, and dermaplaning, Anoop is dedicated to creating a relaxing experience and making every client leave with a smile.

Team.name: Sukneet
Team.bio: Sukhneet is a Medical Esthetician with a passion for glowing skin and good vibes. With a curious mind and steady hands, she’s all about helping clients feel confident in their own skin—one treatment at a time. Whether it’s customizing facials or diving deep into skin science, Neetu brings both heart and hustle to every appointment. She’s excited to grow with the industry, stay on top of the latest innovations, and sprinkle a little skincare magic wherever she goes.

Contact.address: 50 Nolanridge Ct NW #140, Calgary, AB T3R 1W7

Review.Name: Farhaz R Lalji
Review.Content: I had an amazing experience with the deep cleanse facial with Nadia! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was calming and relaxing. The aesthetician was incredibly professional and knowledgeable, taking the time to assess my skin concerns and customize the treatment accordingly.The facial itself was thorough—gentle extractions, exfoliation, and a soothing mask left my skin feeling refreshed and radiant. I noticed an immediate difference in how clear and smooth my skin looked. Plus, they used high-quality products that felt luxurious without being harsh.I also appreciated the skincare tips I received for maintaining my results at home. I’ll definitely be coming back for regular treatments. Highly recommend to anyone looking to deeply cleanse and rejuvenate their skin!

Review.Name: Annie Phung
Review.Content: I can’t say enough about how amazing Meena is with helping me feel less anxious during my laser hair removal. The staff is wonderful and greets me well.Got a great deal on laser hair removal treatments and I will be definitely coming back for future services! 🥰🥰🥰

Review.Name: Sarbjeet Malhans
Review.Content: I had great experiences with the laser and BB GLOW treatments. There has been a significant improvement in my skin and hair growth. Environment wise: the space is very clean, anesthetically pleasing, and comfortable. Also, the staff is very friendly and welcoming.

Review.Name: Jasmine Kaur
Review.Content: I had my laser treatment and it was amazing. I highly recommend it, my hair growth has decreased so much. The environment is very welcoming and friendly. I’m loving my results!

Review.Name: Abosede Beatrice
Review.Content: I did my chemical peel, and the changes have really improved my skin. Honestly, there is a natural turnover on my skin, making it smoother and reducing pores. I recommend Tarora Rejuvenation for your skin care. They work with all skin types and colour.

Review.Name: Dawn Vandermey
Review.Content: By chance I came across Tatora Rejuvenation. Meena gave me her professional opinion on my facial needs. She suggested the Forma procedure.  I had 3 sessions done.  Her and Nadia were amazing, very professional and kind.  My results are exceptional.  I love how my skin looks.  My family and friends agree.  This will be my go to spa for all my skin care needs.  Thank you Nadia and Meena. See you gain.

Review.Name: Sara Gomez
Review.Content: Amazing experience for the past 2-3 years. My mom has known her for so long and now i’ve started coming aswell. I go for threading, waxing and laser hair removal and i always feel so welcome. Meena makes me feel like i am part of her family.
